ticket.title: ASICS changes: Store locator etc.
ticket.original-body:
Mails 1. Change fonts in emails to arial (currently shows up as courier in Lotus notes) 2. Change default sender from: ASICS <online@asics.eu>” but let countries change this in their settings page 3. Currently the default sign at the bottom of each email is ASICS Benelux. Change this to ASICS. Should also be a configuration in settings. 4. Cancellation email not found in /admin/mails (also confirm that all system mails were configured for preview.)
Store Locator 1. Map jumps on store locator after clicking store name 2. ASICS and OTHER ASICS STORES => OTHER RETAIL PARTNERS 3. Is there a reason for the shop order? If not, alphabetize results. 4. What is Alternative name in store admin? 5. What creates the list of categories in the store locator? 6. Stores upload doesn't work well (especially deleting and adding at the same time... Karen reported it took 3 times for it to work)
ticket.latest-body:
Mails 1. Change fonts in emails to arial (currently shows up as courier in Lotus notes) 2. Change default sender from: ASICS <online@asics.eu>” but let countries change this in their settings page 3. Currently the default sign at the bottom of each email is ASICS Benelux. Change this to ASICS. Should also be a configuration in settings. 4. Cancellation email not found in /admin/mails (also confirm that all system mails were configured for preview.)
Store Locator 1. Map jumps on store locator after clicking store name 2. ASICS and OTHER ASICS STORES => OTHER RETAIL PARTNERS 3. Is there a reason for the shop order? If not, alphabetize results. 4. What is Alternative name in store admin? 5. What creates the list of categories in the store locator? 6. Stores upload doesn't work well (especially deleting and adding at the same time... Karen reported it took 3 times for it to work)
ticket.original-body-html:
Mails
1. Change fonts in emails to arial (currently shows up as courier in Lotus notes)
2. Change default sender from: ASICS online@asics.eu” but let countries change this in their settings page
3. Currently the default sign at the bottom of each email is ASICS Benelux. Change this to ASICS. Should also be a configuration in settings.
4. Cancellation email not found in /admin/mails (also confirm that all system mails were configured for preview.)

Store Locator
1. Map jumps on store locator after clicking store name
2. ASICS and OTHER ASICS STORES => OTHER RETAIL PARTNERS
3. Is there a reason for the shop order? If not, alphabetize results.
4. What is Alternative name in store admin?
5. What creates the list of categories in the store locator?
6. Stores upload doesn't work well (especially deleting and adding at the
same time... Karen reported it took 3 times for it to work)

Cancellation email not found in /admin/mails (also confirm that all system mails were configured for preview.)
Store Locator 1. Map jumps on store locator after clicking store name 2. ASICS and OTHER ASICS STORES => OTHER RETAIL PARTNERS 3. Is there a reason for the shop order? If not, alphabetize results. 4. What is Alternative name in store admin? 5. What creates the list of categories in the store locator? 6. Stores upload doesn't work well (especially deleting and adding at the same time... Karen reported it took 3 times for it to work)
version.body-html:
Mails
1. Change fonts in emails to arial (currently shows up as courier in Lotus notes)
2. Change default sender from: ASICS online@asics.eu” but let countries change this in their settings page
3. Currently the default sign at the bottom of each email is ASICS Benelux. Change this to ASICS. Should also be a configuration in settings.
4. Cancellation email not found in /admin/mails (also confirm that all system mails were configured for preview.)

Store Locator
1. Map jumps on store locator after clicking store name
2. ASICS and OTHER ASICS STORES => OTHER RETAIL PARTNERS
3. Is there a reason for the shop order? If not, alphabetize results.
4. What is Alternative name in store admin?
5. What creates the list of categories in the store locator?
6. Stores upload doesn't work well (especially deleting and adding at the
same time... Karen reported it took 3 times for it to work)
version.title: ASICS changes: Store locator etc.

version.body:
Hi Anatole,
> 1. Map jumps on store locator after clicking store name
is it broken? I test on ff and chrome, it works.
> 2. ASICS and OTHER ASICS STORES => OTHER RETAIL PARTNERS
Done.
>3. Is there a reason for the shop order? If not, alphabetize results.
Yes. Order by distance.
> 4. What is Alternative name in store admin?
I can't found any code use "alter_name", should we remove it?
> 5. What creates the list of categories in the store locator?
Each store have categories. we get all stores categories and uniq the categories.
> 6. Stores upload doesn't work well (especially deleting and adding at the same time... Karen reported it took 3 times for it to work)
I imported five times, it seems work every time. could you please tell me how to reproduce the error?
version.body-html:
Hi Anatole,

  1. Map jumps on store locator after clicking store name

is it broken? I test on ff and chrome, it works.

  1. ASICS and OTHER ASICS STORES => OTHER RETAIL PARTNERS

Done.

  1. Is there a reason for the shop order? If not, alphabetize results.

Yes. Order by distance.

  1. What is Alternative name in store admin?

I can't found any code use "alter_name", should we remove it?

  1. What creates the list of categories in the store locator?

Each store have categories. we get all stores categories and uniq the categories.

  1. Stores upload doesn't work well (especially deleting and adding at the same time... Karen reported it took 3 times for it to work)

I imported five times, it seems work every time. could you please tell me how to reproduce the error?
